CustomField.description: IF aml status have atleast anyone KYC value.
CustomField.formula: OR( ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'KYC Pending') , ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'KYC Submitted') , ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'KYC Approved') , ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'KYC Rejected') , ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'KYC Completed') )
CustomField.label: Is Status have KYC ?
